job.title: Project Manager
job.description:
Purpose of the role

To lead the management of designated Customer and internal development projects and communicate project progress to Key Stakeholders and Senior Micro Nav Management in accordance with the requirements of the Project Plan and Contract.  To manage Customer project relations throughout the life of the project. To manage and deliver projects to approved schedule and budget and manage bids and tenders across all lines of business.

Key Duties & Responsibilities

  • Act as Bid Manager for Customer bids and to assist in the creation of a fully developed quotation document and fully costed project model.
  • Prepare and present quotation and bid documents, together with costed project models to senior management for review and approval.
  • Provide an initial schedule with bid resource estimates to functional heads to enable them to provide accurate, agreed low level schedules in return.
  • Project manage allocated projects to time and budget expectations.
  • Create a Project Plan including task breakdown, schedule and budget.
  • Liaise with the all lines of business to ensure accuracy of the data in the Project Plan and to achieve a smooth transition from Sales to Projects.
  • Request internal and external resources as necessary in order to achieve tasks identified as part of a project.
  • Maintain the schedule in consultation with the Customer and Micro Nav teams.
  • Measure progress against the Project Plan, Schedule and Budget to update as required.
  • Obtain formal approval within agreed project criteria for any negative variance to project revenue, profit or schedule.
  • Identify project slippages and to develop recovery strategies to allow the planned events to be achieved.
  • Identify and manage all project risks and to provide mitigation plans, if necessary, in conjunction with the Customer, and Micro Nav Management.
  • Keep all stakeholders aware of any changes to the project timescale and to agree remedial actions.
    Assist the Financial Controller in the management of financial instruments and the timely issue of invoices against agreed project milestones.

Technical Requirements

  • Proficiency in the Microsoft Office suite of tools; Outlook, Word and Excel in particular.
  • Proficieny with Microsoft Project or a similar project scheduling software application.
  • Technical information gathering and analysis skills.
  • Strong PC literacy, good overall ICT skills and appreciation of common hardware and software products.
  • Internet proficiency and cyber security aware.

Education and Experience

  • Experience/knowledge of project management techniques and methods; knowledge and application of Project Management methodologies and techniques.
  • Experience of bid management.
  • Basic knowledge of ATC environment is desirable but not essential.
  • Experience of (project based) personnel management.
  • Experience in a customer-facing role.
  • Experience of dealing with internal departments of mixed disciplines and personnel at all levels.

job.title: Senior Systems Engineer (Requirements Engineer)
job.description:
Purpose Of Job
As Senior Systems Engineer you will be reporting to the Head of Quality Assurance and Systems and will be responsible for providing requirements analysis and systems engineering support for the following business functions:

• Product development for customer projects and R&D
• Sales and Marketing
• Customer Support

The ideal candidate will be required to demonstrate versatility (to deal with a wide range of tasks) and flexibility (to deal with rapid changes in priority). The ability to handle multiple tasks concurrently is essential.
The role will be customer facing and you will be expected to be the focal point for many of the initial and in project customer interactions.

Key Duties & Responsibilities
Ensure accurate capture of the customer requirements, covering solution architecture, development of new and updated features and data interfaces to third-party systems.
Represent the company during activities with customers, integration partners and end-users including requirements gathering, critical design reviews and integration activities held either on-site or via on-line meetings.
Ensure customer requirements are translated into software requirements which:

• Reflect the proposed solution architecture.
• Reflect the operational needs.
• Provide a suitable platform for software testing.
• Will be accepted by the customer first time.

Review solutions to ensure that they address the corresponding functional requirements and that the proposed solution meets both customer needs and any identified internal needs.
Provide system level guidance and technical advice, as required, to other departments.
Ensure that the requirements baseline for each product is maintained.
Comply with the requirements of the company Quality Management System.
Maintain awareness of, and acquire knowledge on, specialist technical topics – as required – to support specific project and internal needs.
Own the process improvement plan in the systems team and related functions of the business.
Attend the office in Southbourne three days a week and as requested.
Travel to customer sites, and be able to travel, across the world.


Technical Requirements
Knowledge of Systems engineering best practice.
Expert understanding of ATC operational protocols and procedures.
Knowledge and use of the Windows family of operating systems.

Education & Experience
Essential:

  • Knowledge/experience of engineering practices, processes, methods, and tools; including requirements engineering and solution architecting.
    Engaging with internal and external stakeholders at all levels
    Deriving of requirements on system components, to fulfil the high-level customer requirements.
    Preparing detailed requirements specifications to control the development and testing of software.
    Strong PC literacy, good overall IT skills and appreciation of common hardware and software products.
    Understanding of requirements management tools.
    Understanding of MS Office tools
    Experience/knowledge of ATC/ATM environment
